messages.title: We were in your area today

keyPolicies.policyDescription: North Yorkshire Police have already started to recruit 200 new officers. We must combat the blight of drugs.
The redevelopment of Whitby Hospital and a new A&E at Scarborough have both been given the green light.
I will campaign for better rail services and to keep the A64 upgrade in the Government's planned programme.
Delivering £33.9 billion for the NHS, 20,000 extra police, and more funding for every pupil in every school.

issues.education: more funding for every pupil in every school
issues.health: INVESTING IN OUR HEALTH SERVICE: The redevelopment of Whitby Hospital and a new A&E at Scarborough have both been given the green light.
issues.lawCrime: MORE POLICE ON OUR STREETS: North Yorkshire Police have already started to recruit 200 new officers.
issues.transport: BETTER TRANSPORT LINKS: I will campaign for better rail services and to keep the A64 upgrade in the Government's planned programme.

community.content: A strong local voice for the Yorkshire Coast with a track record of service

leaflet.personalStatement:
A strong local voice for the Yorkshire Coast with a track record of service.
Working with local businesses to build a strong economy and create jobs.
Delivering record funding and investment for our hospitals, schools and police.

examples: North Yorkshire Police have already started to recruit 200 new officers.
We were in your area today

Working with local businesses to build a strong economy and create jobs
Delivering record funding and investment for our hospitals, schools and police.
We must combat the blight of drugs
The redevelopment of Whitby Hospital and a new A&E at Scarborough have both been given the green light.
I will campaign for better rail services and to keep the A64 upgrade in the Government's planned programme.
More funding for every pupil in every school.
